scripts.test: COV_TEST=true ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --require coffee-coverage/register --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register --require test/support/env --reporter node_modules/mocha-reporter-cov-summary -- test/*.test.coffee
scripts.test-cov-html: COV_TEST=true ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --require coffee-coverage/register --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register --require test/support/env --reporter html-cov -- test/*.test.coffee > coverage-reporter.html
